channel.title: Zonajustr
channel.description: Beat jet lag with this simple tool!

item.title: Silly Calorie Counter
item.description: Have you ever wondered how many eggs of calories you burnt on the jog? well now you do!

item.title: Ten Dummies
item.description: Like a magic 8 ball, but there are loads of them, all ten times dumber!

item.title: Grass-Touching Counter
item.description: Track how long you touch grass, down to the millisecond!

item.title: Awake Population
item.description: How many people are awake... right now?

item.title: Country War Simulator
item.description: Watch every nation battle it out in this crazy simulator!

item.title: Silly Comparisions
item.description: How far could you go if you only ran while blinking, or only cycled while sleeping? All of those crazy answers and more!

item.title: Nameswap Calculator
item.description: What does a girl name for John sound like? Or a boy name for Alice? Find out here!

item.title: Word Chain Game
item.description: Play with a friend - start with a word, and chain the last two letters with the next word. Super fun!

item.title: School Year Bingo
item.description: Gather a group, make your very own bingo cards for the school year and see who wins!

item.title: Weird Keyboard
item.description: I made a keyboard where you only use one hand - and it doesn't even have to move! (does not work on all devices)

item.title: Unblocked Snake
item.description: The classic snake game, but unblocked! (It even has a FAKE TITLE!!!)

item.title: DNA Optical Illusion
item.description: I wanted to make a spinning strand of DNA, but instead made a bamboozling illusion!

item.title: Dumb AI Poem Generator
item.description: I hired the dumbest AI in the world to make poetry...

item.title: Goofy Calendar
item.description: I don't like our calendar, so I made my own!

item.title: Rhythm Triangle
item.description: Test your rhythm with this highly addictive game!
